body.body: Front wheel parts kit intro DUY
A new front wheel with brake dampers has been introduced to the Bonneville T120 Black from the following VINS:
VIN 827029 for all markets except India and Brazil.
VIN 832393 for the India and Brazil markets.
The following items are in the front wheel parts kit.
Front wheel parts kit - description DUY
Models Built up to VIN 827028 (front wheels without brake dampers)
Should the front wheel require replacing, a parts kit (part number 2007014) is available.
Models Built from VIN 827029 (front wheels with brake dampers)
When ordering replacement parts, refer to the EPC
When ordering replacement parts, refer to the EPC.
The removal and installation of the front wheel, brake pads, brake discs, and dampers are as described in the Service Manual.
Please mark your copy of the Service Manual with this information.

Please mark your copy of the Service Manual with this information. For electronic service manuals, store this information in a readily accessible place and refer to it often. This information will be included in the next service manual update.
